main_definition: Saturday is the seventh day of the week in many cultures, typically associated with being a time for rest and leisure after the workweek.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The specific day of the week
meanings_and_examples.example: I have a meeting scheduled on Saturday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A common reference to lazy or relaxed behavior during the weekend
meanings_and_examples.example: On Saturdays, I usually just stay in and watch movies all day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression used humorously to describe someone's laziness or lack of motivation
meanings_and_examples.example: Don't tell me what time you woke up today; I already know it was Saturday and lazy people sleep in.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial term used to indicate the start of a weekend break or vacation period
meanings_and_examples.example: We're taking our trip starting on Saturday, so we can enjoy more time together before Monday comes.
